Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.The identification may include the version of the specification as well as any customizations applied.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Order agreement identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Order Response Number (T3345). Peppol: A unique identifier for an order agreement. The identifier must be globally unique since the receiver is using it as an order number (issued by the seller).

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Vendor Order Number (T6099). Peppol: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: Order agreement issue date
Element.Description: BEAst: Document Date and Time (T6325). Peppol: The date on which an order agreement was issued. Must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Order agreement issue time
Element.Description: BEAst: Document Date and Time (T6325). Peppol: The time of the day when the order agreement was issued. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Order agreement note
Element.Description: BEAst: Transportation Information (T6008). Peppol: Free-form text applying to the order agreement.Free text applying to the order agreement.
Element.Value: We have a new phone number 33 44 55

Element.Name: Order agreement currency
Element.Description: BEAst: Order Currency (T6018). Peppol: The default currency for the order agreement

Element.Name: Buyer reference identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Project Number (T6004). Peppol: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes. The identifier is defined by the buyer (contact ID, department, office id, project code), but provided by the seller in the order agreement and later in the invoice.

Element.Name: Previous order agreement identifier
Element.Description: A reference to a previous identifier for an order agreement. Used to indicatete that this agreement is a change to a previous agreement. This is an optional business term but is a required element in the UBL syntax so if no previous order identifier is available use NA.

Element.Name: Tender or lot reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Ultimate Customer Order Number (T6221). Peppol: The identification of the call for tender or lot the order agreement relates to.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Document Name (T6484), Offer Number (T6010), Freight Forwarder Reference Number (T6127) or Drawing Number (T6222). The DocumentType describes which of them. Peppol: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: BEAst: Document Type External (T6473), "BEAST:OfferNumber", "BEAST:FreightForwarderReferenceNumber" or "BEAST:DrawingNumber". Peppol: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: BEAst: Embedded document binary object (T6475). filename contains Embedded document file name (T6476). Peppol: The attached document embeded as binary object, coded as Base64. The binary object has two supplementary components: a Mime Code, which specifies the Mime type of the attachment and a Filename that is provided by (or on behalf of) the sender of the document

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Reference to external document

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: BEAst: Link to Related Document (T6187). Peppol: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Contract reference
Element.Description: The identification of a contract.

Element.Name: Contract identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Reference to Agreement or Contract (T0007). Peppol: A reference that uniquely identifies a contract that relates to this transaction.

Element.Name: Seller supplier party
Element.Description: The supplier is the legal person or organization who provides a product or service.

Element.Name: Seller party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the seller party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: Supplier (T0009). schemeID tells what type of identity that is used. Peppol: A identifier for the seller that is issued by the party that sends the document in which the identifier is used.Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: Street Name (T5003). Peppol: The main address line in an address. Usually the street name and number or post office box.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: City Name (T5005). Peppol: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: Postal code (T6117). Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country Code (T5007). Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Sellers legal registration name
Element.Description: BEAst: Party Name (T5001). Peppol: The full (formal) name by which the seller is registered in the national registry of legal entities or persons.The name of the party.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: BEAst: Name (T5012). Peppol: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: Phone Number (T5010). Peppol: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: Email Address (T5011). Peppol: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Customer party
Element.Description: The customer is the legal person or organization who is in demand of a product or service.

Element.Name: Buyer party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the buyer party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Buyer customer account identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Buyer (T0008). schemeID describes the type of identity that is used. Peppol: A identifier for the buyer that is issued by the party that sends the document in which the identifier is used.An identification for the buyer party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: Street Name (T5003). Peppol: The main address line in an address.Usually the street name and number or post office box.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: City Name (T5005). Peppol: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: Postal code (T6117). Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country code (T5007). Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: BEAst: Party Name (T5001). Peppol: The full name of the buyer.The name of the party who ordered the items and receives the response.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: BEAst: Name (T5012). Peppol: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: Phone Number (T5010). Peppol: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: Email Address (T5011). Peppol: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Originator party
Element.Description: The unit initiating the order. Most often the end user.

Element.Name: Originator identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Ultimate Customer (T6223). schemeID describes the type of identity that is used. Peppol: An identifier for the party that originally requested the ordered items.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Originator name
Element.Description: BEAst: Party Name (T5001). Peppol: The name of the party that originally requested the ordered items.

Element.Name: Accounting customer party/Invoicee
Element.Description: The invoicee is the legal person or organization acting on behalf of the customer and who receives the invoice for the order.

Element.Name: Accounting customer identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Invoicee (T0085). schemeID describes the type of identity that is used. Peppol: A unique identifier of the accounting customer

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Accounting customer name
Element.Description: BEAst: Party Name (T5001). Peppol: Accounting customer name

Element.Name: Delivery information
Element.Description: Delivery gives information on when and where the goods and services are deleivered.

Element.Name: Promised delivery period
Element.Description: The period when the goods or services are delivered.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period Start Date (T6319). Peppol: The date when the period starts.The date is the first day of the period. Must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period Start Time (T6734). Peppol: The start time of the period. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period End Date (T6320). Peppol: The date on which the period ends.The date is the last day of the period. Must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period End Time (T735). Peppol: The end time of the period.Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Delivery party identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Party (T0037). schemeID describes the type of identity that is used. Peppol: A identifier for the party that carries out the delivery.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Delivery party name
Element.Description: BEAst: Party name (T5001). Peppol: The name of the party to which the goods and services are deliverd.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: Street name (T5003). Peppol: The main address line in an address. Usually the street name and number or post office box.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: City name (T5005). Peppol: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: Postal Code (T6117). Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004) or Delivery Place Location (T6015). Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country Code (T5007). Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Delivery terms information
Element.Description: Information on delivery location and special delivery terms

Element.Name: Buyer delivery terms
Element.Description: BEAst: Terms of Delivery (T6710). Peppol: The terms that the buyer applies to the delivery the ordered items.

Element.Name: Delivery special terms
Element.Description: BEAst: Unloading Instruction Code (T6343). Peppol: A description of special conditions relating to the delivery terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery place Terms (T6020). Peppol: The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam"

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: Consignee, Street name (T5003). Peppol: The main address line in an address.Usually the street name and number or post office box.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: Consignee, City name (T5005). Peppol: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: Postal Code (T6117). Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country Code (T5007). Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Allowance or charge information
Element.Description: Information on allowance and/or charges applies to the whole order agreement and is included in the calculation of the order agreement total amount.

Element.Name: Charge indicator
Element.Description: Boolean indicator, charge ='true', allowance = 'false'

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge reason code
Element.Description: BEAst: Special service description code (T6719). Peppol: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as a code. For allowances a subset of codelist UNCL5189 is to be used, and for charges codelist UNCL7161 applies. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Allowance or charge reason
Element.Description: BEAst: Special service description (T6111). Peppol: The reason for the allowance or charge, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: BEAst: Percentage (T6228). Peppol: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance base amount, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. To state 20%, use value 20.

Element.Name: Allowance or charge amount
Element.Description: BEAst: Amount (T6230). currencyID is the same as DocumentCurrency (T6018). Peppol: The allowance or charge amount (net amount).

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: BEAst: Base Amount (T6229). currencyID is the same as DocumentCurrency (T6018). Peppol: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge TAX category code
Element.Description: A coded identification of what TAX category applies to the document level allowance or charge.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge TAX rate
Element.Description: The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the document level allowance or charge.
Tax scheme. E.g. VAT or GST

Element.Name: TAX total amount
Element.Description: The total TAX amount.The sum of all TAX category tax amounts.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: TAX breakdown
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about TAX breakdown by different categories, rates and exemption reasons

Element.Name: TAX category taxable amount
Element.Description: Sum of all taxable amounts subject to a specific TAX category code and TAX category rate (if the TAX category rate is applicable). The sum of line net amounts minus allowances plus charges on document level which are subject to a specific TAX categorycode and TAX category rate (if the TAX category rate is applicable).

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: TAX category tax amount
Element.Description: The total TAX amount for a given TAX category.Calculated by multiplying the TAX category taxable amount with the TAX category rate for the relevant TAX category.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: TAX category code
Element.Description: Coded identification of a TAX category.

Element.Name: TAX category rate
Element.Description: The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies for the relevant TAX category.A TAX rate of 0% is applied for calculation purposes, even if the item is outside the scope of TAX.

Element.Name: TAX exemption reason text
Element.Description: A textual statement of the reason for why the base amount is exempted from TAX.
Tax scheme. E.g. VAT or GST

Element.Name: Sum of line amounts
Element.Description: Sum of all line amounts in the document.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Total amount without TAX
Element.Description: The total amount of the document without TAX including all line net amounts minus sum of allowance amount on document level plus sum of charges on document level.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Total amount with TAX
Element.Description: The total amount of the document with TAX. The total amount with TAX is the Total amount without TAX plus the Total TAX amount. The Total amount shall be equal or greater than zero.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all allowances on document levelAllowances on line level are included in the line amount which is summed up into the "sum of line net amount".

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all charges on document level.Charges on line level are included in the line amount which is summed up into the "sum of line net amount".

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Paid amounts
Element.Description: The sum of amounts which have been paid a-priori.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Rounding of document total
Element.Description: Any rounding of the "Document total including TAX"

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Amount due for payment
Element.Description: The outstanding amount that is requested to be paid.This amount is the "document total amount with TAX" minus the "Paid amount" that has been paid a-priori. The amount will be zero in case the document total amount with TAX is fully paid .

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Order agreement line identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Line Number (T0051). Peppol: An identifier for an individual line that is unique within an order agreement.

Element.Name: Order agreement line note
Element.Description: BEAst: Line Item Information (T6031). Peppol: Free-form text applying to the order agreement line.

Element.Name: Ordered quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: Ordered Quantity (T0039). unitCode is Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706) Peppol: The number of item units that are ordered.

Attribute.Name: Ordered quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the ordered quantity.

Element.Name: Order agreeement line amount
Element.Description: BEAst: Line Item Net Amount (T6234). currencyID is the same as DocumentCurrency (T6018). Peppol: Order agreeement line amountThe total amount for the order agreement line, including all taxes except TAX.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Delivery information on order agreeement line level
Accepted quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: Quantity to be Delivered (T3240). unitCode is Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706). Peppol: The number of item units that are delivered.

Attribute.Name: Accepted quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the accepted quantity.

Element.Name: Promised delivery period for the order agreement line
Period start date
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period Start Date (T6319). Peppol: The date when the period starts. Must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period Start Time (T6734). Peppol: The start time of the period. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period End Date (T6320). Peppol: The date on which the period ends.The date is the last day of the period. Must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period End Time (T6735). Peppol: The end time of the period. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Item net price
Element.Description: BEAst: Price Amount (T6235). currencyID is the same as DocumentCurrency (T6018). Peppol: The price of an item, exclusive of TAX, after subtracting item price discount."The net price has to be equal with the gross price less the item price discount.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: Price Unit Basis Quantity (T6722). unitCode is Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706), Peppol: The number of item units to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the base quantity.

Element.Name: Price type
Element.Description: BEAst: Price Code (T6025). Peppol: The type of the item price. The type may be given by using codes from UN/CEFACT code list 5387.

Element.Name: Price discount information
Element.Description: Information on discounts connected to the price

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator
Element.Description: Only discounts are allowed for the price, hence the only valid value is false (meaning an allowance)

Element.Name: Discount amount
Element.Description: BEAst: Amount (T6230). currencyID is the same as DocumentCurrency (T6018). Peppol: Discount amount connected to the price

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Item list price
Element.Description: BEAst: Base Amount (T6229). currencyID is the same as DocumentCurrency (T6018). Peppol: The gross price of the item before subtracting discounts. E.g. list price.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, if element "Order agreement currency" (tir110-007) is used, this attribute must be the same code as used there.

Element.Name: Item description
Element.Description: BEAst: Product Information (T6037). Peppol: Free-form field that can be used to give a text description of the item. A detailed description of the item.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: BEAst: Article Description (T6226). Peppol: A name for an item. A short name given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Buyer's Part Article Number (T6022). Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyer's system.

Element.Name: The Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Supplier's Article Number (T0172). Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154) or RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023). All other item number standards used within BEAst can not be used here until the organisation behind the standard decides to be a part of the codelist "ISO 6523 ICD". These are: NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo/Vilma Article Number (T6029), Norwegian RSK Article Number (T6024), Norwegian E-number (T6026), E-number (T0260) and SGTIN (T6461). Peppol: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Document Name (T6484). Peppol: Identifier of a document

Element.Name: External Item Specifications Type
Element.Description: A functional description of the attachment/image expressed as code

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: BEAst: Document Type External (T6473). Peppol: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: BEAst: Embedded Document Binary Object (T6475). filename contains Embedded Document File Name (T6476). Peppol: The attached document embeded as binary object, coded as Base64. The binary object has two supplementary components: a Mime Code, which specifies the Mime type of the attachment and a Filename that is provided by (or on behalf of) the sender of the document

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: BEAst: Link to Related Document (T6187). Peppol: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to classify the material when the item number is not sufficient (T6466), to inform about the source of classification standard (T6467) and to provide standard branch codes for the items. The Reference to Article Class (T6466) is the ItemClassificationCode, listID = "ZZZ", listVersionID = BEAST:4.0" and name is Source to Classification (T6467). Peppol: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code
Attribute.Description: The textual equivalent of the code value

Element.Name: Contracted item indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: Price Type Code (T6720). In Peppol "CT" is the only valid code, so it can be used only when the Price Type Code is "CT". Peppol: The code CT indicates that the item is offered in accordance to the referenced contract.

Element.Name: Item TAX category code
Element.Description: BEAst: Tax Category NeB Type (T6708). Peppol: The TAX category code for the item.

Element.Name: Line TAX rate
Element.Description: BEAst: VAT Rate (T0027). Peppol: The TAX percentage rate that applies to the line amount.
BEAst: Tax Base Type NeB (T6707). Peppol: Tax scheme. E.g. VAT or GST

Element.Name: Additional item property information
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: BEAst: Property Name (T6446). Peppol: The name of the property.The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant.

Element.Name: Item property code
Element.Description: BEAst: Property ID (T6444). listID is Property ID Type (T6443). Peppol: Code for the item property according to a property code system.

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: BEAst: Property Value (T6452). Peppol: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: BEAst: Property Compare Code (T6457). unitCode is Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706). Peppol: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Attribute.Name: Value quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the value quantity.

Element.Name: Property classification
Element.Description: BEAst: Property Value ID (T6450). Peppol: Standardized and predefined classification of items properties.

Element.Name: Item label information
Element.Description: Information about the items environmental, social, ethical and quality type of labelling.

Element.Name: Item label name
Element.Description: BEAst: Certificate Number (T6413). Peppol: The name of the product label.

Element.Name: Certificate type code
Element.Description: BEAst: The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA. Peppol: The UBL structure used for item labeling requires this elements, use the value NA.

Element.Name: Item label type
Element.Description: BEAst: Type of Certificate (T6412). Peppol: The label type such environmental, quality, social etc.

Element.Name: Item label value
Element.Description: BEAst: Percentage Certified (T6414). Peppol: The label value that applies to the item.

Element.Name: Issuer name
Element.Description: BEAst: The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA. Peppol: The UBL structure used for item labeling requires this elements, use the value NA.

Element.Name: Item label reference
Element.Description: A reference to where the label specification can be found, e.g. a URI.
